    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103214</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound experiments - bell in a vacuum jar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stichhaltige Experimente - Glocke in einem 
Vakuumglas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expériences saines - cloche dans une fiole de 
vide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiências sadias - sino em um frasco do 
vácuo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimenti sani - flangia in un vaso di vuoto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υγιή πειράματα - κουδούνι σε ένα κενό βάζο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimentos sanos - alarma en un tarro del 
vacío</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a bell inside a jar in vacuum. No sound will be heard even if the bell rings due to absence of a vibrating medium like air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vacuum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Glocke innerhalb eines
Glases im Vakuum. Kein Ton wird gehört, selbst wenn die Glocke 
Ringe wegen des Fehlens einem vibrierenden Medium Luft mögen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une cloche à 
l'intérieur d'une fiole dans le vide. Aucun bruit ne sera 
entendu même si les boucles de cloche dues à l'absence d'un support 
vibrant aiment l'air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um sino dentro de um 
frasco no vácuo. Nenhum som será ouvido mesmo se os anéis do 
sino  devido à ausência de um media vibrando gostam do ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una flangia 
all'interno di un vaso nel vuoto. Nessun suono sarà sentito 
anche se gli anelli della flangia dovuto assenza di un media di 
vibrazione gradiscono l'aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα κουδούνι μέσα σε 
ένα βάζο στο κενό. Κανένας ήχος δεν θα ακουστεί ακόμα κι 
αν το κουδούνι χτυπά λόγω στην απουσία ενός δομένος μέσου όπως
τον αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una alarma dentro de un
tarro en vacío. No se oirá ningún sonido incluso si los 
anillos de la alarma  debido a la ausencia de un media que vibra 
tienen gusto del aire.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glocke</string>
          </keyword>
